Reviews.Title: Great tv LED tv for price
Reviews.Author: dk
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv from Kmart for $397. It has a great picture. Much clearer than my 52" plasma. I am very happy with it. The 60 Hz processor is fine as I was concerned with it not being a 120 Hz.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated
Reviews.Author: Jaime

} var node = cv_mo1O34ONL4INXO1preplay.parentNode; var cv_mo1O34ONL4INXO1currentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1O34ONL4INXO1currentClick) { return cv_mo1O34ONL4INXO1currentClick(); } } } Length:: 1:09 MinsHI to all interested on buying this product I have this to say: I bought this television about six months ago and just yesterday itstarted to fail. Half of the screen is black and today I've been trying to get some tech support from RCA and this is where I getfrustrated is like they don't care about you...They just transfer me to someone else and they've been doing that all the times I havecontacted them. If this is just a personal experience with this RCA product, well that might be my luck, but if this is common on these RCA LED televisions this lesson will teach me not to buy any RCA product again ever. I will have to call them again tomorrowbut I don't like this hassle. If others customers have better experiences with this RCA product, is not my case; I would like not todown grade RCA products, however judging from this unpleasant experience I just have to say: their customer support sucks. There's no reason for me to recommend this product to other people to get frustrated like I am at this moment. I have included a short video of the problem I am dealing with, thus you'll know that I'm not making this up. If somebody has good reviews on another brand for LED television I'll appreciate any suggestions; I'm not cheap I'd just like a trouble free television for a reasonable time. I don't want to deal with these dinosaur companies Which they are only hungry for money. If someone is looking into buying this product, I really hope you won't end up where I am now after a few months: annoyed and frustrated.

ProductInfo.Features:
2 HDMI Connections
Resolution: 1920 x 1080p
Contrast Ratio: 4000:1
Tuner Mode: ATSC/NTSC
USB Media Play: Photos, Music
ProductInfo.Name: RCA LED46C45RQ 46-Inch LED-Lit 1080p 60Hz TV (Black)
